name: Help & Helps Samiti

address: DR. Rajendra Nagar, Civil Lines Ward,

briefDescription: We are Help and Helps Samiti (Health, Education, Livelihood, Pluck and safety), registered as NGO in the State Chhattisgarh Society registration act 1972 on 27 November 2009. We are working for human welfare and to built better future of country. Our slogan is “Reach each Helpless and needy people for help”. Currently we are working in the state of Chhattisgarh and moving forward to work for all over India.
